 */export var CLEAR_WISHLIST='CLEAR_WISHLIST';export var UPDATE_ITEM_OPTIONS='UPDATE_ITEM_OPTIONS';export var REMOVE_ITEM_FROM_WISHLIST='REMOVE_ITEM_FROM_WISHLIST';export var UPDATE_ALL_PRODUCTS_IN_WISHLIST='UPDATE_ALL_PRODUCTS_IN_WISHLIST';export var UPDATE_IS_LOADING_IN_WISHLIST='UPDATE_IS_LOADING_IN_WISHLIST';/**
 * Remove specified product from wishlist
 * @param  {Object} product Product which should be removed
 * @return {void}
 * @namespace Store/Wishlist/Action/removeItemFromWishlist
 */export var removeItemFromWishlist=middleware(function(item_id){return{type:REMOVE_ITEM_FROM_WISHLIST,item_id:item_id};},"Store/Wishlist/Action/removeItemFromWishlist\n");/**
 * Update all products in wishlist
 * @param  {Array} products Products that should be updated in wishlist
 * @return {void}
 * @namespace Store/Wishlist/Action/updateAllProductsInWishlist
 */export var updateAllProductsInWishlist=middleware(function(products){return{type:UPDATE_ALL_PRODUCTS_IN_WISHLIST,products:products};},"Store/Wishlist/Action/updateAllProductsInWishlist\n");/** @namespace Store/Wishlist/Action/updateIsLoading */export var updateIsLoading=middleware(function(isLoading){return{type:UPDATE_IS_LOADING_IN_WISHLIST,isLoading:isLoading};},"Store/Wishlist/Action/updateIsLoading");/** @namespace Store/Wishlist/Action/updateItemOptions */export var updateItemOptions=middleware(function(options){return{type:UPDATE_ITEM_OPTIONS,options:options};},"Store/Wishlist/Action/updateItemOptions");/** @namespace Store/Wishlist/Action/clearWishlist */export var clearWishlist=middleware(function(){return{type:CLEAR_WISHLIST};},"Store/Wishlist/Action/clearWishlist");
